mapper.insert: insert into question (pno, writer, content) values (#{pno}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: select q.qno, q.writer, q.pno, q.content, q.reg_at, m.nick_name from question q inner join member m on (q.writer = m.mno) where q.pno = #{pno}
select count(qno) from question where pno = #{pno}
